website_summaries.verdict: These durable bags hold everything from flip-flops to heels to sneakers. Plus, they keep your shoes safe AND your clothes clean.
pros: Waterproof, lightweight nylon with your choice of drawstring or zipper closure
Use for travel, gym trips, or dust protection in the closet
cons: make sure your shoe size and bag size match

customer_reviews.title: Good for woman's shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Great for my shoes, not for my husband's shoes. They were not big enough for his size 12 high tops, unless he put one shoe in each bag. Description of the larger shoe bag fitting a men's 10-14 size is incorrect. However, they work well for woman's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: samantha o.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. I easily put women's size 8 Under Armour running shoes and flip flops inside with room for another pair of flat sandals. I shoved my husbands size 11 running shoes and his flip flops in another. It comes with four bags, simple black, good zipper, and the ability to hang them as it has a handle/tab on one end. The ultimate test was when I laid a bag in the sink and sprayed it with water. Inside is dry!
customer_reviews.author: LoveShackTravels

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 pairs of shoes into the big bag to travel to Sweden! Tennis shoes, water shoes and 2 pairs of sandals. It's great because it saves room in the suitcase and keeps the bottoms of shoes off clothes. The material seems very sturdy. You can also use them to put other items in if you want. I really like these bags and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: rlhinca

customer_reviews.title: Shoe lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I call this my "shoe lunch box." I carry my dress shoes to work in these, so they don't get ruined in the rain or snow. A lot better than shoving them in my purse. The loop makes for easy carrying when your hands are full, though I wish it was just a tad larger so I could fit it over my wrist. I can carry a pair of chunky heeled ankle boots in the medium size pouch - loads of room for flats and heels. There are generous gussets at the sides for expansion. My husband uses the large size for his dress shoes. The material is A heavy nylon type. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kmt22

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and roomy bags, we were quite pleased. We travel full time and we don't want our shoes to mess up or smell up any of our other apparel. These are very well made, and have enough room for most shoes. My only suggestion would be to have a little window where you could make a little tag for what is in the bag (since they are black). I do like that they aren't see through though, as it maintains a cleaner look, we made little tags from white duct tape to label the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Lee

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.text: The travel bags are made of strong material; I wouldn't worry about heels piercing them. They appear to be well constructed. They are roomy for my women's size 8 shoes; I've put two pairs of flats into one bag. I don't know how well men's oxfords might fit in the bags, but for my use these are perfect. As for versatility - I'm hard pressed to figure out what else I might use them for, but I suppose they could be handy if used in some type of storage capacity and of course I can pack cosmetics and other small items in them. I'd buy the product again and recommend them for purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Pat V.

customer_reviews.title: then used them to organize our dirty laundry. The bags are really roomy
customer_reviews.text: These almost appear to have a clear top due to the one picture, but they are solid material. Kept our wet shoes from mucking up the rest of the clothes in our luggage during our trip, and I bought a few extra, which took up no space in my luggage, then used them to organize our dirty laundry. The bags are really roomy, so they not only held bulky boots, but also held a fair amount of dirty laundry
customer_reviews.author: T. Mango

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very durable waterproof shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: I have received 4 waterproof nylon shoe bags a few days ago. I wear size 8.5 Men shoe and so far all the shoes I put in fit. I go to the gym a lot and use them to pack my shoes in the gym bag. Works great and I don't have to worry to get my clothes dirty from my shoes or my shoes all wet from the wet towels after I am done. I usually stuff my shoes into grocery bags to keep them separate from my clothes when I travel. I am very happy with this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LouisF

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing shoes and other things
customer_reviews.text: These shoebags hold a full size pair of tennis shoes (put in facing each other or top up). The zipper is a good one. We got 4. Two of them had a grey handle and 2 had a black handle. This made identification easier for my husband and I. On a recent trip, we threw 3 of these in the trunk and took out them out as needed. I kept one in my suitcase. We will be using them on our next trip. You can also store shoes in them. I wasn't expecting the high quality for the price so they are an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: UNIQUE FINDS

customer_reviews.title: Impressed of how well made it is.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product. I have not used them, but I examined it tonight to make sure It's what I want and that there's no damage. I can see that these are quality bags, well made. Checked all the stitching and zippers, it's perfect. Nothing to complain about. Yamiu should be proud of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I used to take old grocery bags to wrap my shoes in during travel. On my last vacation I decided to purchase official shoe bags, it is the best decision I have made. My shoes State nicely put in the zipper bags which provided enough room for the shoes and was not a tight fit. It was nice to be able to protect my clothing from my shoes. I highly recommend these shoe bags!
customer_reviews.author: J. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for myself as part of prime day and love them so much i bought a set for my parents. Very well made and helps contain any dirt you have on your shoes while you travel. Used these to hold my hiking boots that were covered in mud and they kept the rest of my clothes clean. I can fit a pair of tennis shoes (women's size 8) and a pair of sandals in the smaller size and cowboy boots in the big ones.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A real solution to an annoying problem : packing one's shoes for travel in a way that they are fully contained in an attractive manner and where they are preventing dirt and mud from encroaching on your clothing in your suitcase. The product seems to be made well and the ZIPPER is a blessing as the other drawstring numbers always mysteriously tend to come undone by themselves or knot up. Thank you YAMIU for solving what has seemed to be a long standing problem for the stylish traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Queen

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew That Shoe Bags Could Be So Great?!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a week's vacation ... and used these for our shoes (myself, my husband). These are absolutely terrific. One size fits all shoes; I thought this one-size-fits-all might not be so great, but they are constructed to expand for whatever size necessary. They lie perfectly flat when not in use. Excellent material. Clever design. I could not be more thrilled to have found these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupas

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Qualify and Pratical
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Fits all sizes of shoes. No strange chemical smell out of the packaging either, which for me for a product like this is important! Goodbye using plastic bags to store my shoes during travel :)
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: My new luggage does not have the amount of pockets my old luggage had and I miss them. I bought these not for my shoes but to use in place of the pockets I'm missing. I bought them because they are supposed to be lightweight and I didn't need anymore weight in my suitcase. They worked exactly like I was hoping they would for our trip. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: First lady 03

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it Clean
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I ever came across this product, but so glad I did. The one thing I hate when I travel is trying to keep shoes in plastic bags and away from clean clothes. This solved all the problems. The large shoe bag held a pair of tennis shoes, sandals, and flip flips with extra space. I'm a size 8 shoe and was impressed with how easy it was to pack. Glad I own these now!
customer_reviews.author: DebF

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for some fellow travelers. I have to say, they are very impressive in quality. And there's not factory/plastic toxic fumes or smell at all, which I expected. I really love these and am going to order myself a set now even though I don't really need one! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, flexible, great for travel/storage
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely flexible (great for packing!) and roomy, even for large sneakers. I've used these on 4 trips so far with no problems at all. I also use these to store my sandals during winter, etc. I'm not sure how the zipper will hold up (I wish companies would simply use YKK zippers) but they look sturdy and have held up so far. One star docked because I wish there was one part of the bag that was see-through so I could see what shoes were inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These shoes bags were better than I expected. They are actually quite big. I'm able to easily fit my heels in the small bag. And I'm actually surprised that the bigger size bags can fit my tall boots. The material is very nice and soft. Haven't actually tried to see if it's water-resistant though. I travel a lot and haven't been able to find good shoe bags to fit my different styles of shoes. But I think these bags will do - at least for the bigger shoes (sneakers, heels, boots). They are way too big for my flats which I travel with a lot, but it might actually fit at least two pairs in there.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Travel Shoe bags for my husband who was traveling to Mexico. I know from previous trips no matter how hard we tried we would come back from sandy beaches with suitcases of sand. Impossible to get the sand off the crevices of sandals. The travel bags worked perfectly for this. Had one left over so I packed his underwear in that. We've only used the bags twice, but they do seem to be very durable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Overworked Mom and Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: You get 4 (2 medium, 2 large) water resistant bags with zippers but they are extremely spacious! I fit a pair of high heels and sandals in the smaller sized bag and my husband's and my tennis shoes together in the larger bag! If you had winter or construction boots, they should fit in the larger bag alone. These were great to travel with as I usually use plastic bags to transport my shoes but these are so much better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise I don't think they're very good.
customer_reviews.text: The weave is apparently much thinner than expected, which means that any dampness or smell doesn't stay in the bag. I do a lot of hiking, climbing, biking in rainy season etc, and wanted something that would help me travel with my shoes. This might keep shoes organized if they're dry and clean, but otherwise I don't think they're very good.
customer_reviews.author: M D.

customer_reviews.title: Updating my previous review....
customer_reviews.text: OPPS - my bad. I just checked my order, and it looks like I did order the zipper bags (I could have SWORN I ordered the drawstring bags). The picture of the bags, if one enlarges it (I unfortunately didn't) shows that the bags are not see thru. The bags are unzipped in the picture - it just looks like they are see -thru when only the small picture is viewed. I just checked Amazon and can't find what I really wanted (dust/dirt proof shoe bags with a clear side (not just a "window" - but I can't find them. So, I'm keeping these. They are well made and extremely light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ride to the Music

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoe bags so that my shoes would be covered in my suitcase in the unlikely event I went on a vacation. Since I still haven't gone on vacation, I can't say a whole lot about them. However, I thought to put my winter shoes in them (for the summer) and vice versa in winter. This is working out very well as I can stack them and hide them away. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: clarabelle

customer_reviews.title: Shoes don’t fit in 1 bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to out my sneakers in when traveling so I wouldn’t get the rest of my cloths dirty. You need a bag for each shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Howell

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are well made I ordered more than one brand. These were the winners. I use 2 for me and larger 2 for hubby. Perfect for travel. Easy to use. Price is affordable. They seem to be well made. They made it through 3 trips so far. I always used leftover plastic bags for my shoes previously. When I return home and unpack I spray them with Lysol. If you’re like me and know how gross your shoes are and refuse to let them touch clean items when you pack...buy these. Well made and zippers are very functional.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: Two smaller bag doesn't fit men's shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This set has 2 smaller bag, it is not big enough for men's big shoes size. It is junk. Don't buy it. You will waste money if you need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leu

customer_reviews.title: Look very durable
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to try out my shoe bags on my next trip. They look and feel very durable. I can't speak to the water resistance, I didn't try it out. I always hate putting my dirty shoes in with my clothes so this is a perfect solution. My fault, but I guess I didn't read close enough and thought you would be able to see the shoes in the bag but it is solid not see through, I was thinking that since I could see them in the picture but it probably stated that. I also think I will be able to get a couple pairs in one bag which is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Good bags, just don't wash them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags with zippers that seem sturdy. However, if you are like me and need to wash these I would not recommend. I've only washed them once, but had to cut a ton of threads from the inside after the wash. Several, when I pulled on them they kept unraveling. I just stopped pulling and cut those where they were. I still plan to use these. I wear a size 11 in women's and about a 9 in men's. The large size bag will fit my pair of men's work boots, probably no more. The small bag will fit 2 pairs of my flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Living54&more

customer_reviews.title: I am liking it so far
customer_reviews.text: Used it for an overseas travel recently and I found the product to be very good. I could nicely fit a men's pair of shoes inside. So I think this is large enough for most shoes and qtr boots but nothing larger or longer. The material is strong enough but you need to be extra careful so that you don't put too much pressure on the zipper. It will break. If you have gentle hands, I see no issues with the product and will keep your stuffs organized.
customer_reviews.author: do_catmando

customer_reviews.title: These items are a great value! I used them for a recent cruise ...
customer_reviews.text: These items are a great value! I used them for a recent cruise and they work WAY better than stuffing my shoes into plastic bags (which is what I used to do on trips). They're great for keeping shoes neat and making sure they don't get dirt on the other items in your suitcase. They're also good for making sure fancy shoes don't get scuffed. I will definitely buy more next time I go on a trip (since I'm sure they'd be great for organizing/separating more than just shoes) I HIGHLY recommend that everyone keep a few of these in their suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! They are an absolute must! I don't know what I did before I had them. Excellent quality and they keep your shoes neatly packed and away from your clothes in your suitcase. The extra large bag will accommodate a pair of tennis shoes or my slippers and flip-flops. Large bags accommodate my dressy stiletto heels. Even if you don't use these for shoes, I highly recommend getting these four things that you would normally stuff in your suitcase such as hair spray or perfume or things like that. Love love love these!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my son who travels quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: 6/24/18 UPDATE: I want to update my review today. It has taken me awhile to figure out how to accomplish this task. My apologies to the seller. Once I posted this review the seller contacted me immediately and sent me a new set of bags. The new bags have been used frequently and have held up much better. I do believe the first bags we received were an exception to the normal quality. January 2018 I bought these for my son who travels quite a bit for work. He used them one time and the bag fell apart. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Can you wash these?
customer_reviews.text: So my husband thinks I'm weird bc I'm always buying what he views as unnecessary oddities. We went on a weekend hiking trip and our shoes got wet and dirty. Luckily I brought sandals to change in. These kept the sand and dirt from our hiking shoes from getting into the rest of the car, so now he views them as a good purchase. My only concern is that I forgot to check to see if you can even wash them. I'm afraid that they may lose some durability if I wash them bc my machines are hard on stuff. Other than that they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: zippers worked fine, and the material seemed water resistant (there was ...
customer_reviews.text: They work very well! I was able to fit my pumps in one (I wear a size 6 women's) and I was also able to fit wedge (4 inch wedge) booties in the same size bag as the pumps. Plenty of space. For the larger bag, I was able to also fit my boots (they reach the knee), but did have to fold the top a bit. seemed quite sturdy- I carried my shoes in my purse for commuting between office locations, zippers worked fine, and the material seemed water resistant (there was a little bit of rain happening). Will come in handy when I travel overseas. overall very happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for traveling with shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for traveling with shoes. Keeps shoes separate from clothes and take up minimal space. I've bought several to share with my family because I was so pleased with them. My daughter and I were in New York and got caught in the rain we were able to pack our wet shoes in these for the ride home. My husbands workout shoes get smelly and the kept the smell from the rest of the suitcase. And after the trip I just threw them in the was and they were ready to use for the next adventure.
customer_reviews.author: I. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bag!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and have used several different kinds of bags to hold my shoes. These work extremely well and probably been one of the best I’ve used so far. These bags have lots of room, and my shoes actually stay in the bag because they are sealed up with a zipper. They seem pretty durable so far and do a good job of keeping anything on my shoes (dirt, etc) in the bag and off the other items in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like them
customer_reviews.text: traveling away from home and i wanted these bags to keep my dirty shoes off my clean clothing, to keep my house slippers clean and they are quite well made and durable. I leave off one star to see how they wear with repeated use. One month in they work as promised. One downside is the size. I have a large shoe and it just about squeezes in the bag and gets zipped. If you wear larger than a womens 10 they may be too small for your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Camie Opulski

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: Just received today, but based on that, the quality is great! So I assume durability will be great as well. I purchased these shoe bags for my 13 year old granddaughter, who plays basketball and travels frequently to play basketball. We will soon be traveling to Sweden for a tournament and her shoes can become sweaty and smelly so I thought these travel bags just might do the trick! They came in a package of 4, two large bags and 2 smaller bags. After our trip to Sweden, if my opinion changes, I will post an update, but based on what I see and feel, and the affordability factor, I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These are really great and keep mud/water inside the bag when needed for packing. The downside is that they aren't really big enough for a men's full sized hiking boot pair. It would also be nice if there was some sort of strap to kind of tighten them down, they take a bit more space than I would like because you aren't able to pack the shoes tight next to each other as you would in the regular suitcase. But overall I am please with them.
customer_reviews.author: kefira28

customer_reviews.title: The standard bags may not meet your needs if you have larger feet
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great. The material is durable and the zippers seem sturdy. I received the package of four bags that contains two “standard” sized bags and two XL bags. I have large feet—I wear a size 10 (women’s). My athletic and hiking shoes fit fine in the Xl bags, but they will not fit in the standard sized bags. This won’t be a problem for women with smaller feet. But, if you have larger feet, the two smaller bags will only be useful for flip-flops, flats, and sandals (all without heels). I recommend this product—I have used them a lot and they have held up well—this is just a warning about the standard sized bags.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof travel shoe bag yamiu
customer_reviews.text: The set has two for small shoes and two for bigger size shoes, which you can put two shoes in the bigger one if you are size 7 in women. The bag is roomy and material is great, including the zippers are smooth and good quality. I didn’t rate high its water proof and durability as I have received them recently but didn’t use them yet. So no comments on that. They don’t have odor at all if you are concerned about that.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected.  Fits ankle boots and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would work for what I needed; but it does! The large size fits ladies size paddock boots. After riding my daughter puts her boots in the bag and zips it up and then puts that bag into her backpack. This helps to keep the inside of her backpack clean. All the dirt and sand stays in the shoe bag and then it's easy enough to shake our or wipe down. Zipper seems sturdy so far. We will use the other bags for traveling this summer.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our recent trip overseas and loved them! The only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is the fact that you can't fit boots in either of the bags. They serve their purpose very well other than that! I've washed them a couple times as well and had no issues with them ripping or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: These were as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great for the purpose, made a a slickery material. my issue was I have size 13 shoes. I wanted the extra large shoe bags for some hiking boots. But they wouldn't fit. And I had to use the extra large size for my regular shoes, The two regular bags were of no use to me. So people who are size 9 or 10 or most women's shoes would work fine with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Well... half of them work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m gonna be honest, I didn’t read closely enough about the differing sizes with these. I thought one was *kinda* smallish for shoes, and the other was bigger for boots. I didn’t realize it was a men/ women or children sort of thing. As such, I bought four bags, and can only use two of them. They should emphasis this is a “family pack” or something a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: TuxedoCartman

customer_reviews.title: More than adequate
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was as described. I ordered the larger bags as I wasn't sure about the fit for my husband's shoes (10.5), but the bags were more than adequate. I was able to pack shoes, socks, and other items that needed padding in each bag- very convenient. They feel "flimsy," but are quite durable. These are great additions to the packing cubes we use.
customer_reviews.author: Kritty

customer_reviews.title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of (4) Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: These Shoe Bags are perfect! There are (2) different sizes, (4) total bags. All are made with sturdy and breathable material. Each bag has a strong zipper that works! In my past travels I always had to throw away my muddy tennis shoes. I did not want them getting my other shoes dirty. Now I can bring all my shoes home and wash the dirty ones instead of throwing them away! I am so very pleased with my purchase and I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Karolkaye

customer_reviews.title: Works well for light travel
customer_reviews.text: Helps protect clothing from damage/dirt from shoes. Also protects shoes from whatever you pack. Since purchasing, we have taking several short weekend trips and even a long extended trip from NC to Alaska, so far they are holding up well, no issues with the zippers or seams so far. Shoes fit well inside (Ladies size 10, men’s size 13). I’m sure with a lot more use, more travel, the material seems it may wear out, but for the amount we travel and pack, they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Atl

customer_reviews.title: 4 Waterproof Nylon Shoe Bags with Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these items for my shoes when traveling. The item is water resistant but I do not think this item will last long as it is made of really flimsy material. I have started using them but am really careful as I do not want to damage the item since it is still new. I will use them until they break and will most likely purchase a replacement that will be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: JVA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a women's size 8 in shoes. I absolutely love that I can fit my heels, booties, sneakers, or any other shoe into this sleek, discreet bag and take them anywhere! My favorite is when I put my heels in them so I can walk to a dinner or event in my flats, then before I arrive I just swap out my shoes and put my sneakers in the bag, voila! I even feel comfortable checking them with the receptionist, since the bag is so nice looking. It also doubles as a bra bag! I can slip 3 or 4 bras in here and carry them with me on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It helps to have extra bags.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle was a bit longer. When I have to carry my work bag, lunch bag, & purse up my 13 steps when I get home or even when I leave in the morning, having to slip it thru my wrist onto my arm would be good. Right now, only can hold on to it with my hand. Otherwise, I like have extra bags for when I need to wash one out. I use one for my workout shoes. I have to wear non-slip shoes at work so I use one bag for those shoes as I change out when I leave work.
customer_reviews.author: Gale M T Sugiyama

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling on cruise ships and airplanes
customer_reviews.text: Overall you cant go wrong with this especially if you wear alot of sneakers, my husband only wears sneakers and I usually just put them in a plastic bag and stuff them in my luggage but then I saw this and was like why not? Well its great cuz you A. Eliminate using plastic bags and B. Avoid your sneakers getting dirt all over your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Maylen

customer_reviews.title: There was plenty of room to keep the items separated and to allow for easy grab and go while we were traveling
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to carry shoes and purses while traveling to a wedding out of state. One held my size 9 shoes, my hand clutch and a zip lock bag with my jewelry. Another held my sneakers and two pairs of sandals. There was plenty of room to keep the items separated and to allow for easy grab and go while we were traveling.
customer_reviews.author: T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Work great and hold my shoes well
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 different sizes of bags in this set. 2 for "women's" shoes and 2 for "men's" shoes. It holds my shoes and by bf's shoes no problem. I can't fit his work boots in the "men's" bag, but mine will fit if tucked properly. My tennis shoes and his fit no problem in 2 bags, and I could probably fit 2-4 pairs of flats in one bag if needed. Overall, I'd recomend these.
customer_reviews.author: katie palmer

customer_reviews.title: It's good for shoes.
customer_reviews.text: (Size 8 1/2 womens) I am excited to see how long these bags will last. The material is not to thick comparable to a draw string bag. There is plenty of room in the small bag to pack my running shoes and gym clothes. Large bag can easily fit two shoes. Will update after my trip to talk about waterproof and durability.
customer_reviews.author: MIC

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a little smaller than other brands but good quality & personalized service.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product. Quality appears to be very good. Yamui emailed me to let me know product was on its way. The only thing that comes into play for me is that the sizing is a little smaller than Simple Housewares and having big feet (long and wide) this matters for me. I am able to use them for shoes, sandals and flip flops but not for my hiking boots or runners which are quite large.
customer_reviews.author: jama

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a trip I will be taking soon. Very impressed with the material quality and these bags are made very well, sturdy and look nice. Zipper closure is well sown and carry handles are also. You get two medium size shoe bags and two large size shoe bags. The bags come in a plastic storage bag. I feel that I made a pretty good purchase and will use the bags soon.
customer_reviews.author: Connie W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags for travel
customer_reviews.text: My greatest fear buying these bags was that they would not be big enough. Turned out the bags were just what I was looking for. In the past I would simply stuff shoes into a plastic grocery bad. These are much better material and zip closed. My hiking shoes fit fine. The smaller size fits most typical shoes, including sneakers. I have now traveled twice with these packed and they are much better than using grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: jmvitner

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I had been using pillow cases to pack my shoes. It actually works great and they're easy to wash. When I saw these, I had to try them. They're great. The material is very light and makes packing a little better since they aren't bulky. I don't know what the manufacturers recommendation is. But, I washed them in my washing machine on delicate with Lysol laundry sanitizer and hung them to dry. They came out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Balistreri

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description.  Shoe bags are different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not specify all the shoe bags are different sizes. Misleading product description. Not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Bags to organize my Gym Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags to organize mostly my gym bag. I put dirty shoes in the larger bags (I bought a 4-pack) and toiletries and electronics in the two smaller bags. After 2 months there seem durable and I hope to get good wear from them. My only suggestion for a product improvement would be a color change on the bags (maybe the handle) to help me pick out the contents without opening. Good job YAMIU.
customer_reviews.author: Mark London

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger shoes
customer_reviews.text: There are two sizes of bags. The smaller size will not fit a mens 9.5. I had two sizes and the small size fit my womens size 8 clogs. We were able to swap and still both have four, but if you have larger shoe sizes it likely would not work out. I giving them one less stars on an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: M^2

customer_reviews.title: Varying Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! As someone with a traveling job who lives out of a suitcase for the year, these are incredible. You can put a variety of shoes in them--slippers, flip flops, tennis shoes, booties. The only things I don't think I could fit (unless potentially in two separate large bags) is winter boots. But they're so great, and you never have to worry about getting dirt or sand on the rest of your luggage. It's way nicer than using plastic bags every time.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe bags, bought them for a trip, mainly so my shoe soles wouldn't dirty my clothes and they worked well, also had one in my carry on so that when I traded shoes for slippers in the plane cabin, my freshly removed shoes wouldn't be smelling up the area and they worked well for this. The larger bags worked well for my large sized women's hiking boots, with a little smooshing, so fairly roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Illuminatrix

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Broken right out the package ! Leaving for Spain tomorrow. These arrived two days ago. Opened them today and can’t even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: not big enough
customer_reviews.text: nice quality but I wear size 13 and these barely fit one dress shoe let alone a pair. misleading product description.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, That was a nice surprise because for the price I didn't really expected to be that well. I would definitely purchase this item again it was perfect for putting my shoes in my suitcase for traveling. I've dropped the downy fabric softener inside it with my shoes and I had no issues with my clothes smelling like my shoes at the end of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: These are great for putting my work shoes and extra clothes in my backpack. I wear a size 11 and they fit in the smaller bag without any issues. I am 6'2" and the larger bag can hold a pair of jeans, t-shirt, hoodie, belt and socks. I was surprised at how much they hold. I have only had them a week but so far they have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to replace ones purchased from another manufacturer a short time ago that did not hold up well at all. These bags appear to be of much better material and quality. Should not there are only 2 shoe bags and 2 misc. bags that are a little smaller in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy size for most of shoes. Waterproof and easy clearning. Great value fo the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these travel shoe bags from Amaon's "Today's Deal" offer. The bag is big enough to cover my daughter's high heel shoes. But it's not big enough to accommodate my winter snow boots. No problem at all for daily dressing shoes, sneakers, sandals. The bag is waterproof and can be easily cleaned. All in all, I am pretty happy with this shoe bags. It's a great value for the money at the discounted price offered by Amaon's "Today's Deal".
customer_reviews.author: H. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Guy’s Review for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of bags to pack my gym or work shoes and/or my golf shoes. I wear a size 11 US and they work but BARELY squeeze in. I usually wear smart boots to work and hopes they’d fit the larger bags but they do not. So for regular shaped low ankle shoes, the smaller bags work up to an 11.
customer_reviews.author: MadmanBlueBoxTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Essential for travel
customer_reviews.text: I take these bags on every trip because they are so useful. I use them for packing my shoes (to keep my other items clean), I also use them to store toiletries that may leak (shampoo, perfume, etc.) and I even use them for swim wear or other clothing that may have gotten wet while traveling. I recommend this product for any traveler.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyandFiona1992

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I hate putting my shoes in my luggage with my clothes as the bottom of my shoes can be dirty from normal walking. This bag is the solution I've been looking for. It keeps my shoes clean and dry and keeps my clothes from getting dirty from my shoes. These are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Clockaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoe bags for a running trip so I could stop stuffing my running shoes into leftover plastic bags, but they're nowhere near as roomy as the description indicates. My size 9-9.5 men's running shoes are almost impossible to fit into the smaller bags, and I don't think they'll hold up well to how I have to squeeze the shoes into them. I can get my shoes into the larger bags, but I really would have liked to be able to used all four bags.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shuttlesworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bags for traveling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe bags are just the right size, as there are two of each size... the smaller fit any pair of womens' shoes easily and the larger size fits mens. Actually the smaller size is also accommodating for mens shoes. They are sleek black and the zippers work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Black
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were see through they are not. They are black so unfortunately I’ll have to open them to see which pair they are. As shown it looks like the have a transparent side. They don’t :(
customer_reviews.author: Janine D Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe Bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm very OCD about keep my shoes covered so they do not touch my clothes when I'm packing them in a suitcase. I used to do it the old fashioned way and put them in grocery bags. Now I have these bags, which make it so much more convenient. Luckily I have small feet (size 5 in women's) so I can fit up to 3 pairs of shoes in one bag, and even more if they're flats. Would highly recommend. My family even asked me where I got them from and I’ve bought so many for them.
customer_reviews.author: RNREADS

customer_reviews.title: Bags are opaque; Cannot see which shoes are in the bags
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it appears that you can see through the top...to know which shoes are which. That's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Nice show bags
customer_reviews.text: Just used these on a recent trip and they kept my shoes from touching my clothes in the suitcase. Not much science here, but they're practical and came in handy. You get four for the price and that was a benefit because if any of you ladies are like me - you take multiple pairs of shoes with you when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAre

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Shown one pair of shoes per bag
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Shown one pair of shoes per bag. Bags are much larger, put something between and stack 2 or more in one bag. I shared one each with two daughters. They were delighted. WalMart bags have served us well, but we are extremely pleased with the clear side, black side bags so we can see which shoes are inside. Probably order more for stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great bags but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The bags are exactly what I needed. They work great. The only issue is I have a size 10 men’s foot and the smaller bags are too small. The smaller ones did fit my daughters smaller shoes perfectly. But they say the small ones fit size 10 but they don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyd5

customer_reviews.title: Shoe bags ok.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are adequate to hold shoes. I'm not sure how long they'll last. Pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Bags for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of these so that my husband and I can travel with an extra pair of shoes. The bags are durable and zip up without any issues. He wears a size 12 shoe and his shoes fit in the bags perfectly. I was even able to use a smaller bag to fit my size 10 wedges. The bags come with a strap that can be hung on a hanger or garment bag adding to the convenience of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great product for travel - I can pack my shoes in same suitcase and not worry about shoe crud gettIng on my clothes. Comes in a set of 4 - 2 smaller and 2 large - I put flip flops and running shoes in one of the larger bags - sure helps organizing my packing. I would recommend- product was as expected and shipped right on time
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Cook

customer_reviews.title: $2.25 each. Heck of a deal.
customer_reviews.text: I'd have been perfectly satisfied to have paid $8.99 EACH for these shoe bags. They're lightweight but well constructed, and the zipper, which I assumed would be cheap and delicate at this price point, is actually quality. The two small bags easily hold my wife's size 8 running shoes, and the two larger ones have room to spare after loading my size 11 boats. I'm confident these will last for numerous trips, but at this price, if they just hauled shoes for a single vacation, it would still be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof travel bags in two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well it arrived. I didn't realize it came in two different sizes, however, I'm happy that it did. The material is waterproof and each has a hook with is quite handy. No need to stuff my sneakers and shoes in grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and like to bring several pairs of shoes for different uses - working out, dressing up, etc. Before, I would just use plastic bags to put them in. Then I found these nice shoe bags for a very reasonable price. You get four bags. Two are smaller and two are bigger. If you wear a Size 9 mens or above, the smaller bags might not fit both pairs of shoes very well so be careful. But the product overall is fantastic and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Telly Tse

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I used the smaller bag for one recent trip. It easily held my lowcut, women's size 7 hiking boots. The bags are sturdy, the zipper functions well, and I washed and dried it in the machine (cold water, low heat), without ill effects. The bags could serve as packing cubes as well, I used mine for dirty clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for travels
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each used these for our shoes while traveling through Egypt. The shoe bags held up well. I could just fit my hiking boots in one of the shoe bags. My husband couldn't fit his hiking boots in them, so he used them for his other casual shoes. The bags are durable and well made. No problems. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DeDeRN04

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible OCD and packing my shoes with my clothes has always been an issue for me. I bought these recently for a trip and they were very durable and for once I could put my shoes in the same bag with my clothes and not feel anxious they would contaminate my clothes. I love them and have used them several times since my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pearson

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The moment you see and feel these bags you can tell they are quality made products. The zippers are so smooth and feel tough too. This isn’t like other items with many 5 star reviews, but nothing more than average at best. These won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great zippers and quality better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe Bags arrived supper fast. Well packaged. There are 2 women-sized and 2 men-sized shoe bags in each package of 4. Zippers are good quality and glide very well. The quality of the materials is very good, not flimsy at all. I like the design, the little handle is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive price but impressive performance and durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for 5 months so far while backpacking and I’ve been really impressed. They’ve stood up to the rigors of almost daily use, being crammed into a heavy bag. They do seem to isolate dirt, moisture, and odor from the rest of my belongings. I was skeptical because of the price, but they’ve made me a believer and even if they broke in the near future, I’d likely buy the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Must for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are great for travel and for work. I like the different sizes for different types of shoes. I have had them for a few months, the only downfall is there are threads coming loose, hopefully it doesn't just unravel the whole bag...
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I wanted for packing my biking shoes in my duffel bag. They will be too small for men's shoes over size 9. I've also used them for packing an outfit that's easy to grab out of my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Beachcomber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe travel bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I so love this product! I do a bit of travelling and I am always so particular about how everything is packed nicely and neatly. Well, these certainly keeps my shoes/sneakers/mini boots well protected, clean and snug! The pouches are perfect and durable. And they come in an adorable zipped bag! Did I say I love these???
customer_reviews.author: cn

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my up coming trip in April. We put the shoes in the bag and in our suitcase for a test run. Everything stayed in place and was organized like we wanted it to be. I was surprised to find that you can also put two pair of shoes in them if you lay them too the sides. So far so good. Will up date after our vacation!!!.
customer_reviews.author: CK Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: A really great product. The size and durability of these bags are really great. I was able to cleanly and securely store my shoes in here. The bags are able to accommodate large shoe sizes with ease as well, my fiance wears a size 12 in gym shoes and we had no problems with them. Clean up is also easy with them, we just used a damp towel to clean them and they dried within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black
feature_bullets: 【Great for travelling】Good design for home and travel use. Great for travelling, carrying shoes to & from the gym, or for keeping your shoes dust free in the closet. ( Can also be used as makeup bag, toiletries bags and for other uses.)

【2 Perfect Sizes of Choices】Set of 4, 2 standard sizes +2 X-Large sizes= Perfect size for both lady shoes and man shoes. Standard size: (9"L x 4.7"W x 9.8"H), fit for shoes under size 10. X-Large size: (9"L x 4.7"W x 12.2"H), Large enough for men shoes between Size 10 to Size 14. Also can store 2 pairs of kid shoes, great kids shoe storage bags.

【Waterproof Material】Nylon fabric. Waterproof function. Lightweight and does a perfect job of packing shoes and keeping everything else clean. Great shoe bags for dancing, playing basketball, tennis, golf, for gym and so on.
【Strong Zipper】Specialized Custom-made zipper with high quality smooth zipper teeth, zips up smoothly and durable . The center zipper design makes it easy to get items in and out.
【High quality & Lifetime Warranty】 Quality guaranteed. Unconditional lifetime warranty for any shoe bags with quality issues.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,749 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
